column1: Percut Sei Tuan is a town and district of Deli Serdang Regency in the province of North Sumatra
column2: Indonesia. The population of the town in 2001 was 17
column3: 863.  It is the district capital of the Percut Sei Tuan district
column4: which at the 2010 Census had a population of 384

column2: which is one of the most populated districts in Indonesia
column3: is composed of twenty 'villages' (most of which are suburban to the city of Medan)
